about: .NET news, announcements, release notes, and more!

Azure Verified Modules (AVM) is an initiative to consolidate and set the standards for what a good Infrastructure-as-Code module looks like. Modules will then align to these standards, across languages (Bicep, Terraform etc.) and will then be classified as AVMs and available from their respective language specific registries.
Nishang - Offensive PowerShell for red team, penetration testing and offensive security.

Microsoft Security Copilot is a generative AI-powered security solution that helps increase the efficiency and capabilities of defenders to improve security outcomes at machine speed and scale, while remaining compliant to responsible AI principles
PowerHuntShares is an audit script designed in inventory, analyze, and report excessive privileges configured on Active Directory domains.
Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility - Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates
Welcome to the Microsoft Defender for Cloud community repository

Invoke-AtomicRedTeam is a PowerShell module to execute tests as defined in the [atomics folder](https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/tree/master/atomics) of Red Canary's Atomic Red Team project.
Azure Resource Inventory - It's a Powerful tool to create EXCEL inventory from Azure Resources with low effort
This repository of PowerShell sample scripts show how to access Intune service resources. They demonstrate this by making HTTPS RESTful API requests to the Microsoft Graph API from PowerShell.
Scripts to streamline the deployment and use of the CrowdStrike Falcon sensor
Automation to assess the state of your M365 tenant against CISA's baselines
A small tool built to find and fix common misconfigurations in Active Directory Certificate Services.

The Azure Landing Zones (Enterprise-Scale) architecture provides prescriptive guidance coupled with Azure best practices, and it follows design principles across the critical design areas for organizations to define their Azure architecture
Tools and resources to help you adopt and implement FinOps capabilities that automate and extend the Microsoft Cloud.
